Hope this is a re-post, couldnt see it anywhere!

I know we have set our own in-forum achievements, But what would you like to see in-game?

Ive been thinking of a few and the rewards.

First Kerbal into orbit: Ã‚Â£3,500

10 vehicles in space at once Ã‚Â£8,000

First mun landing Ã‚Â£6,000

Visit every moon Ã‚Â£9,000

etc,

What achievements (funny or realistic) would you like to see and what should the reward be?

"Mecury" - Complete the all the objectives of the Mercury missions (Kerbin to LKO and home safe)

"Gemini" - Complete the objectives of the Gemini missions (Manned rendezvous and docking, EVA)

"Apollo (A)" - Complete the apollo objectives (trans-munar injection, 10 munar orbits, home safe)

"Apollo (B)" - Land a kerbin on the mun and return home safe

"Billions and Billions" - land a probe on Carl Sagan's face.

"Voyager" - Use gravity assist from 3 or more planets to get into solar escape trajectory.

"My God, It's Full of Stars" - Enter the monolith...(there should be one in orbit around Jool).

"My God, It's Full of Stars" - Enter the monolith...(there should be one in orbit around Jool).

...You win.

Idk, it seems a little simplistic just giving us cash for completed tasks.

I hope it's a little more subtle than that.

I'd prefer a more realistic way of getting support, like stating your aims, via mission planing, and then achieving them, more or less.

How about:

"I thought this was a Planet" - Visit Eeloo.

"Hold her steady" - Complete a orbital rendezvous and successful docking manuver without RCS on both vehicles.

And fun ones:

"DonÃ‚Â´t feed the Kraken" - Awake the Kraken

"Take me closer, I want to hit them with my Sword" - On any airless Body, achieve an Orbit passing a maximum of 5 m over the Ground on its lowest pass. (5m with the radar-hight meter that is; the lowest pass is NOT the Periapsis)

Here's some:

"We need to go deeper" - Reach the bottom of a mohole.

"Buzzing the tower" - Come within 100m of the flight control tower off the coast of the KSC.

"Sick air" - On a rover or ground vehicle, acheive an orbit by driving up a hill/ramp/ect.
-Achive FTL speed.

Space is Hard: Your rocket crashed within 10s of launch.

More Boosters!: Build a rocket and achieve orbit with nothing but SRBs.

Thrillmaster: Achieve orbit around Kerbin and transfer to another body using only SRBs.
